channel.title: software on Franck Chauvel
channel.description: Recent content in software on Franck Chauvel

item.title: Software
item.description: I like building software and I am lucky enough to get the opportunity to develop open source tools as part of my job. Below are some I have contributed to: CAMP helps developers amplify integration tests and configuration tests. Given a test sample and variability models CAMP generates, build and execute your tests on many alternatives environments. MAD is a simulator of self-adaptive software architectures. MAD captures the interplay of so-called ‘defencive’ mechanisms (e.
